mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (M_IDX, M_NAME, M_GENDER, M_NICKNAME, M_EMAIL, M_PW, M_PHONE, M_JUMIN, M_TYPE, M_DEL_YN, M_REGDATE, M_QUE, M_ANS, M_PRIVATE, M_BAN_DATE) VALUES (M_IDX.NEXTVAL, #{M_NAME}, #{M_GENDER}, #{M_NICKNAME}, #{M_EMAIL},#{M_PW}, #{M_PHONE}, #{M_JUMIN}, default, default, SYSDATE, #{M_QUE}, #{M_ANS}, default, NULL)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE M_EMAIL = #{M_EMAIL} AND M_PW = #{M_PW} AND M_DEL_YN!='Y' AND M_TYPE='M'
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM MEMBER WHERE M_EMAIL=#{M_EMAIL} AND M_DEL_YN!='Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET M_DEL_YN='Y', M_GENDER=0, M_NAME=' ', M_NICKNAME=' ', M_EMAIL=' ', M_PW=' ', M_PHONE=' ', M_JUMIN=' ', M_QUE=' ', M_ANS=' ' WHERE M_IDX=#{M_IDX}
mapper.select: SELECT ROUND(AVG(RV_STAR),1) "STARFLOAT" FROM MOIM M, REVIEW R WHERE M.M_IDX=#{M_IDX} AND R.MO_IDX=M.MO_IDX
SELECT ROUND(AVG(RV_STAR)) "STARINT" FROM MOIM M, REVIEW R WHERE M.M_IDX=#{M_IDX} AND R.MO_IDX=M.MO_IDX
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MOIM WHERE M_IDX=#{M_IDX}
SELECT MO_TITLE, MO_DETAILREGION, MO_DETAILCATEGORY, MO_COST, MO_MAXPEOPLE, MO_IDX FROM MOIM WHERE M_IDX=#{M_IDX} ORDER BY MO_REGDATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) "MOIMMEMBER" FROM PARTYMEM WHERE MO_IDX=#{MO_IDX} AND P_BAN_YN='N' AND P_FINAL_YN='Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PARTYMEM P, MOIM M WHERE P.M_IDX=#{M_IDX} AND P.P_BAN_YN='N' AND P.P_FINAL_YN='Y' AND P.MO_IDX=M.MO_IDX

SELECT M.MO_TITLE, M.MO_DETAILREGION, M.MO_DETAILCATEGORY, M.MO_COST, M.MO_MAXPEOPLE, MEM.M_PRIVATE, M.MO_IDX FROM PARTYMEM P, MOIM M, MEMBER MEM WHERE P.M_IDX=#{M_IDX} AND P.P_BAN_YN='N' AND P.P_FINAL_YN='Y' AND P.MO_IDX=M.MO_IDX AND P.M_IDX=MEM.M_IDX ORDER BY M.MO_REGDATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PARTYMEM P, MOIM M, REVIEW R WHERE R.M_IDX=#{M_IDX} AND P.P_BAN_YN='N'AND P.P_FINAL_YN='Y' AND M.MO_IDX = R.MO_IDX AND P.M_IDX=R.M_IDX AND M.MO_IDX=P.MO_IDX
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MOIM M, REVIEW R WHERE M.M_IDX=#{M_IDX} AND M.MO_IDX=R.MO_IDX

SELECT M.MO_TITLE, M.MO_REGDATE, R.RV_STAR, R.RV_CONTENT, R.M_IDX FROM PARTYMEM P, MOIM M, REVIEW R WHERE R.M_IDX=#{M_IDX} AND P.P_BAN_YN='N'AND P.P_FINAL_YN='Y' AND M.MO_IDX = R.MO_IDX AND P.M_IDX=R.M_IDX AND M.MO_IDX=P.MO_IDX ORDER BY R.RV_REGDATE DESC
SELECT M.MO_TITLE, M.MO_REGDATE, R.RV_STAR, R.RV_CONTENT, R.M_IDX FROM MOIM M, REVIEW R WHERE M.M_IDX=#{M_IDX} AND M.MO_IDX=R.MO_IDX ORDER BY R.RV_REGDATE DESC

SELECT Z.Z_IDX, Z.M_IDX, Z.Z_ARTICLE, Z.Z_TABLE, F.FR_IDX, F.FR_TITLE, F.FR_CATEGORY, F.FR_REGDATE, F.FR_WRITER, F.FR_COUNT, M.M_PRIVATE FROM ZZIM Z, FREE F, MEMBER M WHERE Z.M_IDX=#{M_IDX} AND Z.Z_TABLE='F' AND Z.Z_ARTICLE=F.FR_IDX AND Z.M_IDX=M.M_IDX
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ZZIM Z, MOIM M WHERE Z.M_IDX=#{M_IDX} AND Z.Z_TABLE='M' AND Z.Z_ARTICLE=M.MO_IDX
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ZZIM Z, FREE F WHERE Z.M_IDX=#{M_IDX} AND Z.Z_TABLE='F' AND Z.Z_ARTICLE=F.FR_IDX ORDER BY F.FR_REGDATE DESC

SELECT Z.Z_IDX, Z.M_IDX, Z.Z_ARTICLE, Z.Z_TABLE, M.MO_IDX, M.MO_TITLE, M.MO_DETAILCATEGORY, M.MO_DETAILREGION, M.MO_COST, MEM.M_PRIVATE, M.MO_MAXPEOPLE FROM ZZIM Z, MOIM M, MEMBER MEM WHERE Z.M_IDX=#{M_IDX} AND Z.Z_TABLE='M' AND Z.Z_ARTICLE=M.MO_IDX AND Z.M_IDX=MEM.M_IDX ORDER BY M.MO_REGDATE DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET M_PRIVATE=#{M_PRIVATE} WHERE M_IDX=#{M_IDX}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE M_EMAIL=#{M_EMAIL} AND M_PW = #{M_PW} AND M_DEL_YN='N' AND M_TYPE='A'
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET M_DEL_YN='S', M_BAN_DATE=SYSDATE WHERE M_IDX=#{M_IDX}
UPDATE MEMBER SET M_DEL_YN='N', M_BAN_DATE=NULL WHERE M_IDX=#{M_IDX}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM FILE_T WHERE F_TABLE='P' AND F_ARTICLE=#{F_ARTICLE} AND F_MAIN_YN='Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FILE_T(F_IDX, F_TABLE, F_ARTICLE, F_OGNAME, F_SVNAME, F_SIZE, F_MAIN_YN, F_DEL_YN, F_REG_DATE) VALUES (F_IDX.NEXTVAL, 'P', #{F_ARTICLE}, #{F_OGNAME}, #{F_SVNAME}, #{F_SIZE}, 'Y', 'N', SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE FILE_T SET F_OGNAME=#{F_OGNAME}, F_SVNAME=#{F_SVNAME}, F_SIZE=#{F_SIZE}, F_REG_DATE=SYSDATE WHERE F_ARTICLE=#{M_IDX} AND F_TABLE='P' AND F_MAIN_YN='Y'
